product_name: Riderz Street Shred Pad Set - Girls'
long_description: The Riderz Street Shred Pad Set helps your adventurous girl have more fun on her bike, with fewer scrapes and bruises. Set includes padded fingerless gloves, elbow pads and knee pads. Pads feature a flexible fit for easy mobility; designed for ages 3 - 8. Riderz Street Shred Pad Set for girls is for casual use only; not designed for motorized vehicles or stunt riding.
short_description: The Riderz Street Shred Pad Set helps your adventurous girl have more fun on her bike, with fewer scrapes and bruises. Set includes padded fingerless gloves, elbow pads and knee pads.
